pkgmetadata.longdescription: FDclone is a file & directory maintenance tool for the UNIX based OS (called as "UNIX" expediently below). It is a clone of "FD" for MS-DOS, made by Mr. A.Idei in 1989.

use.flag: Normally, wave-dash(SJIS 0x8160) converts to U+301c, but in case of this, converts to U+ff5e like Microsoft implementation.
